titleInfo.title: Steamboat Owens sunk in Big Goddell, La.

mods.note: The photograph album (unbound) contains 103 black and white prints mounted on paper. The images show scenes from several locations in Louisiana during the 1920s. Photographer unknown.

physicalDescription.note: Black and white photograph mounted on paper

titleInfo.title: General Foster Joseph Tate Photograph Album

mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
